channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Doris(Incubating)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Doris(Incubating)

item.title: CVE-2022-23942|2024-08-03T03:59:23.369Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20doris%28incubating%29
item.description: Apache Doris, prior to 1.0.0, used a hardcoded key and IV to initialize the cipher used for ldap password, which may lead to information disclosure.
